metadata.title: CVE-2024-47220 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the WEBrick toolkit through 1.8.1 for Ruby. Itallows HTTP request smuggling by providing both a Content-Length header anda Transfer-Encoding header, e.g., "GET /admin HTTP/1.1\r\n" inside of a"POST /user HTTP/1.1\r\n" request. NOTE: the supplier's position is"Webrick should not be used in production."

criterions.comment: ruby-webrick package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
